productHighlights.title: Features designed for your story
productHighlights.subtitle: Every tool thoughtfully crafted to help you capture, organize, and share your life's most important moments
productHighlights.sectionDescription: Combining AI storytelling, professional services, and preservation technology to create the most comprehensive life documentation platform ever built.

detailedFeatures.title: AI-Powered Memory Assistant
detailedFeatures.description: Our intelligent chat guides you through your life story with personalized questions. Voice or text input, automatic structuring, and smart gap detection to ensure nothing important is forgotten.

detailedFeatures.title: Interactive Life Timeline
detailedFeatures.description: Beautiful, drag-and-drop timeline with rich media support. Organize by decades, themes, or relationships. Real-time collaboration and automatic backups ensure your story is always safe.

detailedFeatures.title: Expert Interview Service
detailedFeatures.description: Professional storytellers and journalists help capture deeper narratives. Seamless booking, HD recording, AI transcription, and integration into your timeline. Perfect for family elders.

detailedFeatures.title: Premium Publishing Suite
detailedFeatures.description: Transform your timeline into a stunning hardbound book, digital memoir, or shareable family archive. Custom layouts, professional printing, and secure family sharing options.

detailedFeatures.title: Rich Media Library
detailedFeatures.description: Upload photos, videos, documents, and audio recordings. Smart organization, facial recognition, and automatic metadata extraction. Cloud storage with family access controls.

detailedFeatures.title: Legacy Preservation Technology
detailedFeatures.description: Bank-grade security, automatic backups, and 100-year digital preservation guarantee. Your family's stories will outlast generations with our quantum-resistant encryption.

features.title: Smart onboarding
features.description: Start with a guided chat that turns your memories into structured events. Edit anytime.

features.title: A timeline that feels alive
features.description: Clean, alternating layout. Drag, categorize, and tag important moments. See photos and clips in context.

features.title: Interview, when it matters
features.description: Professional interviewers can help you go deeper‚Äîespecially for elder stories. We'll handle scheduling.

features.title: Export a beautiful Life Book
features.description: One click to a polished PDF designed for printing and sharing.

chatSamples.prompt: Tell me about a moment that shaped who you are today
chatSamples.response: When I graduated college, I felt like...

customerValue.sectionDescription: Whether you're preserving family heritage, crafting professional memoirs, or capturing institutional knowledge, Nality adapts to your unique storytelling needs.

segments.title: Families & Elders
segments.subtitle: Preserve generational wisdom
segments.description: Capture grandparents' stories before they're lost forever. Our AI guides elderly users through gentle conversations, while family members can collaborate on shared memories.
segments.testimonial: We preserved 80 years of my grandmother's stories in just three sessions.
segments.author: Maria Santos

segments.title: Authors & Creatives
segments.subtitle: Professional memoir tools
segments.description: Transform your life experiences into compelling narratives. AI-powered story structure analysis, professional interview support, and publishing-quality exports.
segments.testimonial: Nality helped me structure my memoir in ways I never imagined.
segments.author: Dr. James Patterson

segments.title: Organizations & Institutions
segments.subtitle: Institutional memory capture
segments.description: Preserve organizational history, capture retiring executives' knowledge, and create institutional legacies. Enterprise-grade security and collaboration.
segments.testimonial: We've preserved 200+ years of institutional knowledge effortlessly.
segments.author: Heritage Foundation

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: Four simple steps to transform your memories into a beautiful, lasting story

steps.title: Tell us your story
steps.description: Chat naturally by voice or text. Our assistant asks friendly, specific questions to capture events, dates, and details.

steps.title: See your timeline grow
steps.description: Moments become a living, editable timeline‚Äîwith space for photos, videos, and audio notes.

steps.title: Add depth (optional interview)
steps.description: Prefer a guided conversation? Book a session with a real interviewer. We handle scheduling and transcripts.

steps.title: Save and share your Life Book
steps.description: Export a beautifully designed PDF that's ready to print or share with family.

pricing.title: Preserve your legacy,
pricing.subtitle: Start free and create unlimited memories. Upgrade for professional features, expert interviews, and heirloom-quality books.
pricing.legalNote: Prices include VAT where applicable. Interview sessions are billed separately if outside Pro plan.

tiers.name: Standard
tiers.description: Everything you need for your life story

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about preserving your life story

items.question: Who can see my story?
items.answer: Only you by default. You choose what to share and with whom. Access is protected by secure logins.

items.question: What happens to my data?
items.answer: Your data lives in a secure database with per-user access controls. You can export or delete it anytime.

items.question: Do I need to know exact dates?
items.answer: No‚Äîapproximate dates are fine. You can edit details later.

items.question: Can I add videos and audio?
items.answer: Yes. Short videos (up to ~2 minutes each) and audio notes are supported.

items.question: Is there a way to involve a professional interviewer?
items.answer: Yes. You can book an interviewer at any time. They will help you capture richer stories.

items.question: Can I print a physical book?
items.answer: Yes. Export a high-resolution PDF and take it to any print service. Print partnerships are coming soon.

items.question: Do you support families?
items.answer: Yes. You can collaborate on timelines, and we'll soon support shared family spaces.

items.question: What if I change my mind?
items.answer: You can pause or cancel anytime. Your timeline remains available on the Free plan.

items.question: What languages are supported?
items.answer: We support English and German; more languages are on the roadmap.

items.question: Is this suitable for elders?
items.answer: Absolutely. The guided prompts and optional interviewer help make it easy and enjoyable.

finalCta.title: Start your story today
finalCta.subtitle: It takes just a few minutes to begin. You can always come back to add more.
finalCta.privacyBody: Your stories are private by default. Share only what you choose, with whom you choose.

problemframework.title: Why life stories often remain untold
problemframework.subtitle: Understand the common barriers and how Nality overcomes them

section.title: The most common challenges
section.subtitle: These barriers prevent people from sharing their stories

fragmented.title: Fragmented Memories
fragmented.description: Photos, videos, and documents are scattered across different devices and platforms, making it difficult to create a coherent picture.

forgotten.title: Forgotten Details
forgotten.description: Important memories and details are lost over time when not systematically documented.

overwhelming.title: Overwhelming Task
overwhelming.description: The thought of documenting an entire life seems so extensive that you never get started.

nostructure.title: Lack of Structure
nostructure.description: Without a clear framework or guidance, you don't know where to start or how to proceed.

timepressure.title: Time Constraints
timepressure.description: Daily life leaves little room for the time-consuming task of story documentation.

familygap.title: Generation Gap
familygap.description: Difficulties in sharing and transferring stories between different generations and family members.

section.title: How Nality solves these problems
section.subtitle: Our thoughtful solutions for every challenge

aiassistant.title: AI-Powered Assistant
aiassistant.description: Our intelligent assistant helps recall forgotten details through targeted questions and prompts.

structured.title: Structured Approach
structured.description: Clearly defined chapters and themes give you a roadmap through your life story.

flexible.title: Flexible Scheduling
flexible.description: Work at your own pace - pause and resume whenever you want.

collaborative.title: Collaborative Platform
collaborative.description: Involve family members and share memories together in a secure environment.

preservation.title: Permanent Preservation
preservation.description: Your stories are safely stored and preserved in various formats for the future.

multimedia.title: Multimedia Integration
multimedia.description: Seamlessly connect photos, videos, documents, and audio with your written memories.

cta.title: Ready to tell your story?
cta.subtitle: Overcome these barriers with Nality's thoughtful approach
